full_summary:
# Fine Grinding Mill Tender Announcement
**Reference Number:** WS3749531020-Doc3820978702
**Contract Title:** PR4481_23240-230346-B Fine Grinding Mill
## Tender Details

* **Publication Date:** January 10, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** February 8, 2023 at 2:00 p.m EST. Please note that late bids will be declared non-responsive.
* **Expected Contract Start and End Dates:** January 25, 2023 to January 25, 2024

## Contract Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of Natural Resources (NRCan), Lands and Minerals Sector (CanmetMINING) is inviting tenders for the supply of a Laboratory-scale Fine Grinding Mill.

The lab-scale Fine Grinding Mill must meet all mandatory technical requirements specified in the contract documents. This includes, but is not limited to:

*   A Laboratory-scale Fine Grinding Mill
*   All necessary documentation
*   A one-year warranty, including maintenance and support services

## Tendering Process

*   The tendering process is competitive and open to all qualified suppliers.
*   Tenders must be submitted by February 8, 2023 at 2:00 p.m EST.

## Contracting Entity and End-User Information

*   **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **End-User Entity:** Department of Natural Resources (NRCan), Lands and Minerals Sector (CanmetMINING)
*   **Contact Information:**
    *   Renee Lepage, PSPC/SPAC
    *   Phone: (Not Provided)
    *   Email: [Renee.Lepage@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:Renee.Lepage@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

## Notice and Attachment Information

The tender notice and related documents can be accessed on the Ariba Discovery website at: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15090493?extsite=MTUwOTA0OTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15090493?extsite=MTUwOTA0OTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
